billEvents.eventText: referred to corporations, authorities and commissions

title: Increases membership of the metropolitan transportation authority to 21 members, with one member each to be appointed by the five N.Y. city borough presidents
summary: Increases the membership of the metropolitan transportation authority from 16 to 21 members; 5 members appointed by recommendation of the borough presidents of the city of New York, one from each borough; provides counties of Dutchess, Orange, Putnam and Rockland with two collective votes; increases votes of counties of Nassau, Suffolk and Westchester from one to two each.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the membership of the metropolitan transportation authority
